<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Rotate secret"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/apps/{id}/rotate-secret"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to rotate the secret of a set of credentials in your Port organization.<br/>

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
